sentences.en: "Who's your publisher?" — "Lockett Press," she said, and she raised an eyebrow meaningfully.
sentences.cn: “你的出版商是谁？”——“洛基特出版社，”她回答道，并意味深长地扬了扬眉毛。

sentences.en: A few years ago I was asked by a publisher to consider writing a novel, and the idea has been in cold storage ever since.
sentences.cn: 几年前，一位出版商要我考虑写一部小说，但之后这事就搁置下来了。

sentences.en: He quit his job and struck out on his own as a publisher.
sentences.cn: 他辞去原来的工作,独自经营出版社.

sentences.en: He's writing a history of the town for a local publisher.
sentences.cn: 他正为当地的一家出版社撰写该镇的历史.

sentences.en: Her publisher wants her to spice up her stories with sex.
sentences.cn: 她的出版商想让她在小说中增添些性描写以吸引读者。

sentences.en: His son, Arthur Ochs Junior, is expected to succeed him as publisher.
sentences.cn: 他的儿子，小阿瑟·奥克斯，有望子承父业继续从事出版。

sentences.en: It has become the biggest publisher of new poetry in Britain, with 50 new titles a year.
sentences.cn: 它成为英国最大的新诗出版商，每年推出新书50种。

sentences.en: Nigel Deering, the publisher, is quietly confident about the magazine's chances.
sentences.cn: 出版商奈杰尔·迪林心中对这份杂志的成功很有把握。

sentences.en: She works as a publisher's reader.
The publisher are looking for a Chinese tranlator for her novel.
sentences.cn: 出版商正在为她的小说找一位中文翻译.

sentences.en: The publisher expected the book to sell 1,500 copies, tops.
sentences.cn: 出版商预计该书至多能卖出1,500本。

sentences.en: The publisher has printed 10 , 000 copies of the book.
sentences.cn: 这本书出版社已印了一万册.

sentences.en: The publisher upped the ante for the biography by offering 1000 yuan.
sentences.cn: 这家出版社提高了这部传记的预约稿酬,愿比其竞争对手多付1000元.

sentences.en: The publishers planned to produce the journal on a weekly basis.
sentences.cn: 出版社计划将这份杂志做成周刊。

sentences.en: The sell-off is aimed at repositioning the company as a publisher principally of business information.
sentences.cn: 出售公司部分业务的目的是将公司重新定位为以商业信息类出版物为主的出版商。

sentences.en: The suit was faultless: Wood guessed that he was a very successful publisher or a banker.
sentences.cn: 西装无可挑剔：伍德推测他可能是个相当成功的出版商或银行家。

words.tran_cn: 出版；发行（publish的现在分词形式）；发表

trans.tran_cn: 出版人/机构，发行人/机构
trans.tran_en: a person or company whose business is to arrange the writing, production, and sale of books, newspapers etc
